page.title: 08KINSON_SPORTING ACTIVITIES
page.content: You can play many sports in the Kinson area such as football and cricket. You can play football for Bearwood United who train at Bearwood or play with some friends in the field between the Broadway and Horsham Avenue.You can also play cricket there. There is a cricket club in the private sports ground in Kinson Park Road.The club is Bournemouth Sports Club.You can also play rugby and hockey in the sports ground.In Pelham's Park you can play bowls,putting,cricket and tennis.If you join the Club there you can play darts,snooker,ten_pin bowling,pool and go on fruit machines.
